name: Apple Tart reversible pinafore
description:
Super cute modern twist on a pinafore, with the Darling Apple fabric reversible with sweet little purple dot on turquoise cotton.

This cute pinafore you can layer over long sleeve onesies, jeans, or pants with a little sweater for cold winter month's. When warmer temperatures arrives she will look just as cute with it alone as a dress or paired with shorts, bloomers, or a little skirt...ah just perfect for the farmers market ....


Also a great apron or smock...but a little too cute....

Pinafore is trimmed cute vintage buttons on both sides to make it easily reversible and they will vary with stock on hand but will always be adorable.

Most of my items are custom made for you are will be made in 7 days of order or less and then shipped to you so please allow for that. Priority shipping can be provided if need sooner so please inquire before purchase.

name: Claire flower wrapped kimono shoes
description:
These adorable shoes will fit a 3m-9m old and keep those piggies nice and warm.

They are lined with red wool felt and wrapped with super sweet flower fabric.

What a perfect gift that new mom and dad and the little one will love it too!

name: Chandelier reversible pinafore
description:
Modern twist on a pinafore,

Tina Givens and Amy Butlers fabrics together is is perfect the outcome !

You can layer the pinafore over long sleeve onesies, jeans, or pants with a little sweater for cooler weather. Your little one can also where it alone as a dress or paired with shorts, bloomers, tutu or a little skirt.

Also a great apron or smock...but a little too cute....

This pinafore is very versatile : you have 2 dresses in one and this pinafore will last about 2 years from the size purchase. It will start out as a short dress and become a tunic since its very roomy in the middle.

Pinafore is trimmed cute vintage buttons on both sides to make it easily reversible and they will vary with stock on hand but will always be adorable.

name: CLAIRE Bow dress
description:
Super Sweet Clarie Bow Dress is great for any occasion, tea party or even a day at the zoo. The bow makes it easy to put on and take off. Also the dress is nice an roomy to keep your little one nice and cool this summer.

The Claire Bow dress is also great for layering with a pair of jeans or legging for a cute stylish look.

name: Olive Rose dress
description:
Super Sweet dress and new collection of little girls dresses, with an elastic neckline..super easy to put on and take off.

The bow in the front can be untied and tied in the back for that special kimono look..great for layering in cooler weather and light for those spring/summer days. Looks great with jeans, leggings with knee high boots or just some cute mary janes or sandels.

description:

light weight gauze Japanese fabric
The skirt has a super cute pleated piece in front for a super cool look. Great for layering and adorable with sandals.

name: Chirp Kimono wrapped shoes
description:
AS SEEN IN PREGNANCY AND NEWBORN MAGAZINE JANUARY 2009
view at www.lilyskydesign.blogspot.com

These adorable shoes will fit a 3m-9m old and keep those piggies nice and warm.

They are lined with red wool felt and wrapped with beautiful fabric from Freespirit

What a perfect gift that new mom and dad and the little one will love it too!Great for the Holidays!

I would love to take credit for this cute pattern but I got it from Greenjelly here on Etsy and was given permission to sell them. So if you can sew get your pattern from her for these cute shoes. If not I would love to send you a pair.

Thanks for looking, please check out the rest of my shop for more cute accessories for kids.

name: Scrappy the Elephant
description:
Super sweet Elephant made with beautiful scraps that I have
piling up. Complete with a cute little pocket on both sides to carry a friend or two, or maybe even a tooth. This will soon be your little ones favorite or even yours...............

Each one will be different but if you prefer one of the two pictured let me know. Otherwise let me know the colors preferred and I'll do my best in making your scrappy elephant.

name: Blast off bib and burpie
description:
Super cute space adventure bib and burpie for your little one or great as a gift for that new mother and baby

Bib has chenille backing, which is very absorbent

Bib comes in handy with a great vintage style pearl side snap
washes up great , mother tested

Burpie is backed with Gerber cotton diaper.

fits 0-16m

They both wash up great and come good as new, over, and over again.

length-10.5in
width-7.5in
Bibs can be made larger,just let me know in your order!

Gift wrapping available on request

name: Koto Stoller Blanket
description:
This stroller blanket is definitely an eye catcher , KOTO by Alexender Henry with the soft,warm and cozy furry fleece on the back. I also embroidered the top for a professional look.

You'll enjoy this blanket with plenty of style and
your little one will surely enjoy it as well!

The blanket is a great size for the stroller or car seat,
33" X 22" and is machine washable.

name: Big bag of Fab scraps
description:
Along with everyone else I am also cleaning my studio and I have a load of scraps that I can't possibly use all myself.

This is an 11 1/2 by 11 1/2in bag stuffed full of Designer fabric scraps,. 1lb 2oz bag of wonderful designers such as Michael Miller,Alexander Henry, Amy Butler,Freesprit,Tula Pink etc.

Great for .....
button covers
small quilts
patches
scrap books
crafting
small sewing projectss
etc.
